intro: This document serves as the Product Specification and User Manual for the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service (CLMS) CLC+ Backbone Raster Product 2021. It provides comprehensive information for users, detailing product characteristics, production methodologies, data quality, and access conditions. The CLC+ Backbone is a key component of the CLMS's new product suite, offering an object-oriented, large-scale, wall-to-wall (EEA-38), high-resolution (HR) inventory of European land cover, derived from Copernicus Sentinel-2 time-series data.
